abstract: HSBC has been named as the top underwriting bank in global initial public offering rankings for the first time, bolstered by strong deal-flow from Asia and the Middle East.
lead_paragraph: HSBC has been named as the top underwriting bank in global initial public offering rankings for the first time, bolstered by strong deal-flow from Asia and the Middle East.

headline.main: HSBC Tops Underwriting Ranking for the First Time
